title: Top U.S. states by number of hogs and pigs 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number in thousands in each State on the y axis.
The maximum Number in thousands 23500.0 is found at State Iowa and the minimum is found at Kansas where State is 2040.0.
There is a difference of 21460.0 between the maximum State Iowa and minimum State Kansas.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
The maximum Number in thousands 23500.0 is found at State Iowa and the minimum is found at Kansas where State is 2040.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number in thousands in each State on the y axis.
The maximum Number in thousands 23500.0 is found at State Iowa and the minimum is found at Kansas where State is 2040.0.
Second maximum Number in thousands is found at State North Carolina.
The difference of Number in thousands between the highest and lowest State is 21460.0.
The State Iowa has the highest Number in thousands, followed by North Carolina, and Minnesota. Down to the State Kansas which is the lowest.
The lowest value 2040.0 at Kansas is almost 3.65 times smaller than the average value 6431.0.
